ygData.subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Ziltus! we wanted a LAN gaming table!!! Hehehehe
ygData.msgSnippet: HELLO GUYS!!! First thing first, marriage life is SOOOOOOOOO GOOOOOOOODDDDDDDDD.  Now I know why BB always stop gaming so early, coz there are so many things
ygData.messageBody:
HELLO GUYS!!!

First thing first, marriage life is SOOOOOOOOO GOOOOOOOODDDDDDDDD. Now I
know why BB always stop gaming so early, coz there are so many things else
to do at the later part of the night, kkekekekekek ;P

Anyway the honor is mine. Thx a million to u guys from coming to my
wedding dinner. I really enjoy myself very much during the dinner (and
after the dinner of coz, kekekeke ;P). I'm also pretty surprised to meet u
guys coz u guys dun 'fit' into my imagination, LOL.

Eg Merns - handsome dark-tone model-like young man, I really can't imagine
this young man pulling train and cause so many deaths, muhahahhaha ;P.
Massiah - KNN also handsome but more to playboy style. Dunno whether if
he is telling me the truth when he say he dun really speak up much. Perhap
his seducive face already do all the talking, hehe. Anson, he looks too
young to have achieve so much in RL, in term of career. Like a student but
already doing own business. KNN baby face woman pker, hehe. Kellendil, i
think I didnt remember u wrongly, the one with sexy moustache? I think you
must be always hanging at Mdm Wond seducing those young gals. Gala - Wah
liao, look youngest ah! Another woman seducer with baby face. Leshrec -
no wonder once college open, never see ya face. Got the height and look,
I think if ah qua come also kena attracted by u, kekek. Last but not
least, our big brother BiBi - face of 'satistifed' married man with
happiness all over his face - I guess I will follow his foot step very
soon, muhahahah ;P

Thx to Garren and Tri for the blessings. I might be cutting my gaming a
bit but dun worry I cut down too much. My wife already know my style many
yrs ago and as long as I dun overplay, she won't nag at me, hehe. Frankly
speaking, I really think we shld come out for a gathering every now and
then, like my UO kakis (some also in D2 and EQ). Even it's just a coffee
talk-cock-sing-song session, it will help to bring us closer and understand
one another.

Once again, thx a million to all u guys who have fork out your precious
time to attend my wedding dinner. I hope very soon we will have an
opportunity to attend another kakis's wedding dinner ;)

Ziltus (de married man)

p/s: Zan, I'm in office now. Tonight I will help u clear NM act 3 & 4 so u
can join BB in hell ;)


On Thursday, 07 September, 2000 7:37 PM, Bobby Tan
[SMTP:trifrost@...] wrote:
>
>
> Congrats Ziltus :) Hmm next time must ask u how to
> get GF and still be able to play games at same time :)
> Still single and getting older hehe. Maybe can ask yur
> wife to recommend some friends to me, I promised i'll
> take a bath and put on my best armor .....er i mean
> clothes for the meeting :)
>
> Trifrost the old Bachelor
>
>
> > ----- Original Message -----

> >

> > >

> > > Recalling the good old times and just chatting
> > about gaming brought back

> > > conversation. Pity Ziltus wasn't able to join us

> > > happily busy right now kekekeke!!
> > >

> > could see you and put a

> > > to that sexy Dark Elf butt i've

> > always a next time!

> > who weren't there to give
> > > him your congrats! :)
> > > Lets all wish him a great happy (productive!)
> > future with his newly wedded
> > > beautiful wife!
> > >
> > > C O N G R A T S!! Ziltus from all of us...
> > >
> > > Was great fun and i hope to see all of you
> > sometime again! Tata for now...
> > >
> > > Signing off,
> > > Yours truly - Zanderion (D2 username as well!)
> > >
> > > p.s. Got a barbarian Diablo2 action figure i
> > bought for you with me, Kar
